original: EXHIBIT 10.13 JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT Collectible Concepts Group, Inc. ("CCGI") and Pivotal Self Service Tech, Inc.
ollama_generated:
EXHIBIT 10.13 JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT Between Pivotal Self Service Tech, Inc. ("PSTI") and Collectible Concepts Group, Inc. ("CCGI")

This agreement governs the joint venture activities between PSTI and CCGI, with PSTI assuming a more active role in the daily operations of the joint venture, subject to the approval of CCGI. CCGI hereby grants PSTI broad discretion in managing the affairs of the joint venture, except for decisions concerning the strategic direction or major investments, which shall require the prior written consent of CCGI. In the event that PSTI fails to secure such consent and proceeds without it, CCGI shall not be held liable for any losses or damages resulting from such actions. Furthermore, CCGI reserves the right to terminate this agreement upon providing written notice to PSTI if PSTI's management decisions are consistently at odds with the strategic goals and objectives agreed upon in this joint venture agreement.

original: (a)  The purchase of Products for resale; (b)  The acquisition of a license(s) permitting the use of selected images in the Products; (c)  The sale and distribution of the Products to retailers and distributors; and, (d)  The transaction of such other and further business as is necessary, advisable, or incidental to the business of the Joint Venture.
ollama_generated: (a) The procurement of goods for resale; (b) The acquisition of a license(s), if required, to utilize specific images within these products; (c) The transfer and dissemination of these Products, at the discretion of the parties, to third-party retailers and distributors; (d) The conduct of any other business activities deemed essential, opportune, or ancillary to the operations of the Joint Venture, with the understanding that such activities may not be exclusively undertaken by either party without mutual consent.
